duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care under the supervision of a physician in the field of internal medicine.
Diagnose and treat patients based on medical history, symptoms, and test results.
Maintain accurate and detailed medical records to ensure complete documentation of patient care.
Adhere to healthcare compliance regulations and standards to ensure patient safety and confidentiality.
Provide emergency care and treatment for patients in critical condition.
Perform clinical procedures and examinations to assess and treat patients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physician Assistant Studies (Master's preferred)
